snippet: M. Sanjayan, lead scientist for the Nature Conservancy, doesn’t fly if his presence is not crucial at the destination.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features M Sanjayan, lead scientist for Nature Conservancy who says he does not fly if his presence is not crucial at the destination.
lead_paragraph: M. Sanjayan, lead scientist for the Nature Conservancy, doesn’t fly if his presence is not crucial at the destination.

headline.seo: An Environmentalist Weighs the Fallout of Flying
headline.main: An Environmentalist Weighs the Fallout of Flying
headline.print_headline: An Environmentalist Weighs the Fallout of Flying
